data.name: Dogfight Elite
data.description:
Embark on an exhilarating journey through history with Dogfight Elite, a thrilling combat simulator set against the monumental backdrop of World War I and II.

Become the master of the skies in Dogfight Elite. Commandeer the cockpit of a warplane, spearhead a tank into battle, or bravely face the enemy on foot as a resilient soldier. The battlefield has never felt this real and the stakes this high.

Test your mettle in solo play, navigating through meticulously designed training missions that escalate to adrenaline-charged, full-scale aerial dogfights against relentless enemy combatants.

While Dogfight Elite is free-to-play, opting for a subscription unlocks a treasure trove of exclusive benefits. Take to the skies or the battlefield with premium airplanes, tanks, and specially-crafted weapons, and embark on captivating, subscriber-only missions.


Moreover, subscribing allows you instant access to our servers and priority queuing, ensuring that your historic battles remain uninterrupted. Experience the past like never before with Dogfight Elite - the battlefield is waiting for you.

If you have any requests/complaints please visit www.dogfightelite.com forums.
I keep track of all requests and complaints and fix them on each release. Write the details or contact me on the website. I will read your posts and fix it asap!
